languages.text: {n}В проеме врат вы видите {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} с человеческим подобием, встроенным прямо в переднюю панель устройства. При вашем приближении торс едва заметно двигается. Это {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитор{/g} — покорный автоматон, созданный из лоботомированного человека. Страж Камеры поворачивает к вам голову — в одной глазнице вспыхивает два угольно-красных огонька.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В проеме врат вы видите {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} с человеческим подобием, встроенным прямо в переднюю панель устройства. При вашем приближении торс едва заметно двигается. Это {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитор{/g} — покорный автоматон, созданный из лоботомированного человека. Страж Камеры поворачивает к вам голову — в одной глазнице вспыхивает два угольно-красных огонька.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In the gateway arch you see a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} with a human likeness built into the front panel. As you approach, the torso twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В проеме врат вы видите {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} с человеческим подобием, встроенным прямо в переднюю панель устройства. При вашем приближении торс едва заметно двигается. Это {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитор{/g} — покорный автоматон, созданный из лоботомированного человека. Страж Камеры поворачивает к вам голову — в одной глазнице вспыхивает два угольно-красных огонька.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The towering gates before you are reinforced with a thick layer of metal except for one detail — a human likeness built into the front panel of a device. As you approach, the metal skeleton twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its black eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

{n}The towering gates before you are reinforced with a thick layer of metal except for one detail — a human likeness built into the front panel of a device. As you approach, the metal skeleton twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its black eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. languages.text: {n}你看到拱门之中有一台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}，面板前面有个类似于人类的东西。当你走近时，那个东西的躯干微微抽动着。那是一名{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}，是将人类的脑叶切除之后进行改造，从而创造出来的自动装置。哨兵将头转向了你，其中一个眼窝里亮起了琥珀色的虹膜。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the gateway arch you see a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} with a human likeness built into the front panel. As you approach, the torso twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到拱门之中有一台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}，面板前面有个类似于人类的东西。当你走近时，那个东西的躯干微微抽动着。那是一名{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}，是将人类的脑叶切除之后进行改造，从而创造出来的自动装置。哨兵将头转向了你，其中一个眼窝里亮起了琥珀色的虹膜。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En el arco de entrada ves un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} con un cuerpo humanoide insertado en el panel frontal. Cuando te acercas, el torso se sacude levemente. Se trata de un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g}, un autómata obediente creado a partir de un ser humano lobotomizado. El centinela gira la cabeza hacia ti, y uno de sus ojos se ilumina con dos iris que arden como ascuas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the gateway arch you see a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} with a human likeness built into the front panel. As you approach, the torso twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En el arco de entrada ves un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} con un cuerpo humanoide insertado en el panel frontal. Cuando te acercas, el torso se sacude levemente. Se trata de un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g}, un autómata obediente creado a partir de un ser humano lobotomizado. El centinela gira la cabeza hacia ti, y uno de sus ojos se ilumina con dos iris que arden como ascuas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ゲートウェイアーチでは、フロントパネルに人間のような{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}が組み込まれているのが見える。それに近づくと胴体がわずかにひくひくする。これは、ロボトミー化された人間から作られた従順なオートマトン、{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}だ。センチネルが頭をこちらに向けると、片方の眼窩が残り火のような二つの虹彩で輝くのが見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the gateway arch you see a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} with a human likeness built into the front panel. As you approach, the torso twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ゲートウェイアーチでは、フロントパネルに人間のような{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}が組み込まれているのが見える。近づくと胴体がわずかに震える。これは、ロボトミー化された人間から作られた従順なオートマトン{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}だ。 センチネルが頭をこちらに向けると、片方の眼窩が残り日のような虹彩で輝くのが見える。{/n}

{n}ゲートウェイアーチでは、フロントパネルに人間のような{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}が組み込まれているのが見える。それに近づくと胴体がわずかにひくひくする。これは、ロボトミー化された人間から作られた従順なオートマトン、{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}だ。センチネルが頭をこちらに向けると、片方の眼窩が残り火のような二つの虹彩で輝くのが見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans l'arche de la porte, vous apercevez un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} au panneau frontal d'apparence humaine. Son torse tressaille légèrement à votre approche. Il s'agit d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, automate soumis créé à partir d'un être humain lobotomisé. Lorsque la sentinelle tourne la tête vers vous, deux iris couleur de braise s'illuminent dans l'une de ses orbites.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the gateway arch you see a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} with a human likeness built into the front panel. As you approach, the torso twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans l'arche de la porte, vous apercevez un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} au panneau frontal d'apparence humaine. Son torse tressaille légèrement à votre approche. Il s'agit d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, automate soumis créé à partir d'un être humain lobotomisé. Lorsque la sentinelle tourne la tête vers vous, deux iris couleur de braise s'illuminent dans l'une de ses orbites.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In dem Torbogen siehst du einen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}, in dessen vorderes Bedienfeld das Abbild eines Menschen eingebaut ist. Als du dich näherst, zuckt der Torso leicht. Das ist ein {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitor{/g}, ein gehorsamer Automat, der aus einem lobotomisierten Menschen geschaffen wurde. Der Wächter dreht dir seinen Kopf zu, und in einer seiner Augenhöhlen leuchten zwei bernsteinfarbene Iris auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the gateway arch you see a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} with a human likeness built into the front panel. As you approach, the torso twitches slightly. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, an obedient automaton created from a lobotomised human being. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In dem Torbogen siehst du einen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}, in dessen vorderes Bedienfeld das Abbild eines Menschen eingebaut ist. Als du dich näherst, zuckt der Torso leicht. Das ist ein {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitor{/g}, ein gehorsamer Automat, der aus einem lobotomisierten Menschen geschaffen wurde. Der Wächter dreht dir seinen Kopf zu, und in einer seiner Augenhöhlen leuchten zwei bernsteinfarbene Iris auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kemer şeklindeki girişte ön paneline insana benzer bir nesnenin yer aldığı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g} görüyorsun. Yaklaşınca insan gövdesi hafifçe seğiriyor. Bu bir {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetör{/g}: Lobotomi yapılmış bir insandan yaratılmış itaatkâr bir otomaton. Nöbetçi, kafasını çevirip sana bakıyor. Göz yuvalarından biri, kor gibi yanan iki adet irisle parlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the gateway arch you see a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} with a human likeness built into the front panel. As you approach, the torso twitches slightly. The Sentinel turns its head to you, one of its eye sockets lighting up with two ember-like irises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kemer şeklindeki girişte ön paneline insana benzer bir nesnenin yer aldığı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g} görüyorsun. Yaklaşınca insan gövdesi hafifçe seğiriyor. Bu bir {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitör{/g}: Lobotomi yapılmış bir insandan yaratılmış itaatkâr bir otomaton. Nöbetçi, kafasını çevirip sana bakıyor. Göz yuvalarından biri, kor gibi yanan iki adet irisle parlıyor.{/n}
